SourceString: This is the Alltrades Abbey branch office,\nwhich is in charge of job changes.\n<br_break>
Do you want to change jobs?\n<yesno><break>
I see you're not changing jobs. That's fine too.\nNow go.\n<turn_end>
Oh? You are under a\nnasty curse.\n<br_break>
It would be best to change jobs after getting rid of the curse\nat the church.\n<turn_end>
What profession do you want to be?\n<ask><break>
Then what profession do you want to be?\n<ask><break>
...Hmm? You already have the\n{Job_Selected} job.\n<br_break>
...Hmm. Are you changing jobs to\n{Job_Selected}?\n<yesno><break>
Now, {PC}.\nBe like {Job_Selected} and pray.\n<br_break>
O God of Dharma!\nGive {PC} a new life!\n<break>

Okay. From now on, you will live
as {Job_Selected}. Be sure to
review your equipment. Now, go.
<turn_end>
This is the Alltrades Abbey, which is in charge of changing jobs.\nThis is the place where people who want to change their jobs come.\n<br_break>
This is the Alltrades Abbey branch office,\nwhich is in charge of job changes.\n<br_break>
Do you want to change jobs?\n<yesno><break>
You're not changing jobs. That's good too.\nNow go.\n<turn_end>
Well, you're under a nasty curse right now.\n<br_break>
It would be best to change jobs after getting rid of the curse at the church.\n<turn_end>
What job do you want to be?\n<ask><break>
So what job do you want to be?\n<ask><break>
Oh? You already have the job\n{Job_Selected}.\n<br_break>
Okay. Are you changing jobs to\n{Job_Selected}?\n<yesno><break>
Now, {PC}.\nPray for {Job_Selected}.\n<br_break>
God of Dharma!\nPlease give {PC} a new life!\n<break>

Now you will live
as {Job_Selected}. Don't forget to
review your equipment. Now go.
<turn_end>
This is the Alltrades Abbey, which is in charge of changing jobs.\nThis is the place where people who want to change their jobs come.\n<br_break>
